name: Stryopets!
description:
stryopets are in and cool and you could do with one on this special day. bury yourself in the septic scavenged innards of a warm, wet strytopet and never surface.

this is my first ever gamejam thing ever, and it was kind of a challenge to keep things within 300 words because my other twine game in development hit the 50k wordmine yesterday. but it was a great challenge, and gave me the chance to relive a lot of childhood nostalgia by means of virtual pets and their eggs.

- zampano
